alert.note: Alert for Kaibab Plateau (Arizona) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued November 29 at 3:33AM MST until November 30 at 5:00AM MST by NWS Flagstaff
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 5 PM THIS AFTERNOON TO 5 AM MST THURSDAY ABOVE 7000 FEET... * WHAT...Snow expected above 7000 feet. Total snow accumulations of 2 to 6 inches. * WHERE...Areas above 7000 feet near Jacob Lake including US Highway 89A. * WHEN...From 5 PM this afternoon to 5 AM MST Thursday. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. The hazardous conditions could impact the evening commute. Snow forecast from 5 PM Today to 5 AM Thursday: Fredonia 0 inches Jacob Lake 2 to 4 inches .
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.
